yanuwen palakala puwath haraha rate jathika aarakshawata siduwu haniya kesewethath aanduwa thula sitina kalli kandayam ema puwatha palakala madhyawedin sambandhayen me akaraye kriyamargayak ganima haraha kisiyam pirisak sathutu kirimata uthsaha darana bawa nam manawa pahadiliya.

hadanawa nan oon layittawusiyak wage ewwa” nilame kiwwa.

eekiya rajyayak thula haki uparima aakarayata balaya beda harimata eksath jathika pakshaya pramukha yahapalana rajaya katayuthu karana bawa saha ee sandaha parlimenthuwe siyalu paksha wala sahaya laba ganna bawada ohu pawasanawa. 2015 parlimenthu mathiwaranaye di ejapa ya janathawa wetha idiripath kala “pancha widha kriyawaliya” prathipaththi prakashaye sandahan paridi nawa wyawasthawa nirmana kirimedi eekiya rajyayak thula balaya beda siyalu jathinta samagi karawana bawada manthriwaraya awadharanaya karayi.

mata therune mehemayi..
"eekata oona beth yapane thibune na, ee nisa maharagamata yanna kiyala ehen liyumak dunna.

ratak lokayak watina ganiyekuth maragena ipadila methana thuttu deke wada kara kara..
mokada jiwithaye honda dewalma witharak balaporoththu wenna baha.
me polis sthana wishala wenna awashya naha.
eeta patahaniwa kriya kirima sandaha wishala wikalpa gananawak thibe.
eheth pradhana hethuwa sinhala bauddha chinthanayata prawada sanskaranaya patahani wima ya.
diksan kisith kiyannata giye natha.
dan batahira balawega hisa osawamin sitinawa.
ehema baluwama thawamath wiwaha nowi sitina kellan gana kawara kathada?
